name: RunOracleScripts
description: Executes Oracle database scripts using sqlplus commandline tool.
author: pwshliquori
helpMarkDown: Executes Oracle database scripts using sqlplus commandline tool

inputs.name: user
inputs.label: User
inputs.helpMarkDown: User to connect to the Oracle database.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to connect to the Oracle database.

inputs.name: databaseName
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of database for script to run on.

inputs.name: logPath
inputs.label: Log Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to save the log file after scripts have completed.

inputs.name: copy
inputs.label: Copy sql files to log
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy .sql files to the log path.

inputs.name: define
inputs.label: Set define off
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds set define off to the script.

inputs.name: echo
inputs.label: Set echo on
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds set echo on to the script.

inputs.name: timing
inputs.label: Set timing on
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds set timing on to the script.

inputs.name: sqlError
inputs.label: Exit on sqlerror
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds whenever sqlerror exit sql.sqlcode rollback to the script.

inputs.name: failOnOraError
inputs.label: Fail on ORA- Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if a ORA- error occurs and the $LASTEXITCODE is not 0.
